files.plugins/agentic-coding/README.md:
# Agentic Coding

Skills for AI-assisted coding workflows — feature PRDs, specs, and implementation planning. Define requirements before you build.

## Install

```
/plugin install agentic-coding@handsonai
```

## What's Included

### Skills

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `writing-feature-prds` | Guide the user through creating a well-defined feature PRD before implementation |

## Slash Commands

| Command | Skill |
|---------|-------|
| `/agentic-coding:feature-prd` | `writing-feature-prds` |

## Quick Start

```
"I want to build a new feature for user authentication"
→ Walks through the 4-phase PRD workflow: Define, Stress-test, Create Issue, Handoff

"Create a spec for adding dark mode support"
→ Creates a PRD at specs/dark-mode.md with user stories and acceptance criteria
```

## Full Documentation

[handsonai.info/use-the-cookbook/build/agentic-coding/](https://handsonai.info/use-the-cookbook/build/agentic-coding/)

## License

MIT
